document.full_text: scott m. sperling, co-president of thomas h. lee partners, says in a cnbc interview that the threat of a double-dip recession has lessened, and that key credit markets are 'as robust as we've seen' since the financial crisis.
document.title: optimism is back, says top private equity deal-maker
lines_and_colors: scott m. sperling, co-president of thomas h. lee partners, says in a cnbc interview that the threat of a double-dip recession has lessened, and that key credit markets are 'as robust as we've seen' since the financial crisis.
